- Directly to the left (2, 3), right (2, 5), up (1, 4), and down (3, 4) are clear of hazards.
- At (2, 10), (2, 11), and (2, 17), there are gold resources I can collect.

Since I haven't moved from the last position and based on the current state, I should consider moving to collect the available gold to increase my score. 

The best option available to me is to go right to collect gold at (2, 5).

``` Action:2 ```
This action should allow me to move to (2, 5) and collect gold, which aligns with my strategy of resource management and score maximization.
